title: William Howard Taft National Historic Site: Camping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Camping              Campgrounds          While the park does not have any camping facilities or accommodations, visitors can search the internet for local campgrounds near the park. You can also visit recreation.gov for a list of federal recreational sites which offer camping facilities.   The State of Ohio also offers beautiful camping and modern accommodations in many of their state parks near William Howard Taft NHS.
